name: Pakapol (Zian) Pathumthammarong

profile: Driven and curious fullstack student within .NET with a strong passion for programming, problem-solving, and system development. Through personal projects I have gained practical skills in backend and frontend, from database management in SQL to modern web frameworks such as React and Blazor. Previous experience in customer service has given me structure, collaboration skills, and a customer-focused mindset.
